paper_abstract: On the basis of overlapping domain decomposition, we construct a parallel least-square finite element algorithm (PLS) for solving the first-order time-dependent convection-diffusion system. The algorithm is fully parallel. At each time step, only one or two iterations are needed to reach to given accuracy. Some numerical results are reported to confirm the theoretical results.
paper_title: Parallel least-squares finite element method for time-dependent convection-diffusion system
